alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:23AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches over South Pass. 12 to 18 inches in the mountains, with isolated amounts up to 2 feet. Winds gusting 50 to 70 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains, Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate snow is expected to start Tuesday night into Wednesday. A brief lull in snowfall is expected Wednesday afternoon. The second round arrives Wednesday evening, with moderate to heavy snowfall.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
